mcp.title: MCP Providers
mcp.description: Connect your AI tools to powerful MCP services. Browse available providers and follow the integration guides to get started.
mcp.featureStandardDesc: Built on the open Model Context Protocol standard, compatible with Claude, Cursor, and other AI clients.
mcp.featureAuthDesc: Supports both system API keys and user-provided keys. You control access.
mcp.featureToolsDesc: Each provider exposes a set of tools your AI can call to perform real-world tasks.
mcp.noProvidersHint: Administrators can add MCP providers in the admin panel.
mcp.apiKeyHint: You need to provide your own API key in the Authorization header when connecting.
mcp.claudeHint: Add this to your Claude Desktop config file, then restart Claude.
mcp.cursorHint: Add this to your Cursor MCP config file (.cursor/mcp.json).
mcp.generalGuideDesc: You can also fetch the provider list programmatically via the public API endpoint.
